issue.title: [CF 1107] maintank+mainassist targets sometimes do not work
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

as resto shaman i set 2 sets of icons to track Earth Shield and Riptide buffs, one set tracking maintank and the other set tracking mainassist.
they work reasonably well in an organised raid group BUT...

if you join a LFR group you immediately find out that both tanks in LFR are tagged by default by Blizzard as "maintank"... wtf?!
if the random raid leader bothers to set the second tank as main assist then it works properly.. but they rarely bother to do this.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
maintank targets confuse between the 2 main tanks and will show whatever tank matches the conditions.. it cannot differentiate between them.

[b]would it be possible to also add maintank1 and maintank2 targets to differentiate between them?[/b]

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.2.6-16-g54a0c0c (latest current alpha)


> Posted by CurseForge user Adrian_G2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1107 | Raw

comments.body:
note: i also have a set of icons tracking Earth Shield and Riptide for the focus target... the tank trackers are secondary trackers.


> Posted by CurseForge user Adrian_G2

"maintank" is not a unit in TMW - it is a unit equivalency that expands to "maintank1; maintank2; ...; maintank 40". The units that you are asking for already exist.

Edited Apr 11, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

oh thank you... the thing is i actually used "maintank" and "mainassist" as unit id.

i saw that the auto-complete suggested "maintank 1-40"... i thought the 1-40 bit was optional so i removed it. Since unit tracking still works after removing it i didn't think much of it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Adrian_G2
